scripts.dev: pnpm run build && pnpm exec wrangler dev --persist-to ./.wrangler/state --config wrangler.root.jsonc --env local --port ${PORT:-3100}
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm exec wrangler deploy --config wrangler.root.jsonc
scripts.lint: oxlint --tsconfig tsconfig.json src vite.config.ts drizzle.config.ts vitest.config.ts postcss.config.mjs
scripts.lint:strict: oxlint --tsconfig tsconfig.json --deny-warnings src vite.config.ts drizzle.config.ts vitest.config.ts postcss.config.mjs
scripts.lint:fix: oxlint --tsconfig tsconfig.json --fix src vite.config.ts drizzle.config.ts vitest.config.ts postcss.config.mjs
scripts.format: oxfmt --write src vite.config.ts tsconfig.json drizzle.config.ts vitest.config.ts postcss.config.mjs
scripts.format:check: oxfmt --check src vite.config.ts tsconfig.json drizzle.config.ts vitest.config.ts postcss.config.mjs
scripts.db:d1:migrate:local: wrangler --config wrangler.root.jsonc d1 migrations apply vidgen_app --local --persist-to ./.wrangler/state
scripts.db:d1:list:local: wrangler --config wrangler.root.jsonc d1 migrations list vidgen_app --local --persist-to ./.wrangler/state
scripts.db:d1:migrate:remote: wrangler --config wrangler.root.jsonc d1 migrations apply vidgen_app --remote
scripts.db:d1:list:remote: wrangler --config wrangler.root.jsonc d1 migrations list vidgen_app --remote
